text: Ej kasone, ki imon ʙa Man ovarded va pajravi rasuloni Man hasted! Az pokizahoi on ci şumo ʙa dast ovardaed az on ci Mo az zamin ʙarojaton rūjondem, nafaqa kuned va qasd makuned, ki sifati pasti onro, ʙa kamʙaƣalon ʙidihed va hol on ki agar in guna ciz (nafaqa) ʙa şumo doda şavad, xudaton girandai on nested, magar on ki az ʙadii on caşm ʙipūşed. Pas cī guna rozī meşaved ʙaroi Alloh onro, ki xud namepisanded? Va ʙidoned, ki Alloh az sadaqahoi şumo ʙenijoz va dar hama hol sazovori sitoiş ast
